original: @79b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @79b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya badzra p'a ni aashtotta ra sha ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
analyzed: a'arya badzra p'a ni aashtotta ra sha ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
translated: Aryavajrapāṇyaṣṭottaraśataka-nāma-dhāraṇīmantrasahita

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /
translated: The Noble One Hundred and Eight Names of Vajrapāṇi, along with the Dhāraṇī Mantra

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi spoke his essence mantra:

original: aom badzra tsanda sarba dushtam ta ka /
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda sarba dushtam ta ka /
translated: Oṃ vajra caṇḍa sarva duṣṭaṃ taka

original: ha na da ha pa tsa h'um phat/
analyzed: ha na da ha pa tsa h'um phat/
translated: ha na da ha pa ca hūṃ phaṭ

original: de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g-yos par gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g-yos par gyur te /
translated: As soon as this dhāraṇī was explained, the great earth shook.

original: bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo //
analyzed: bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo //
translated: All the obstructors and misleaders were terrified and cried out in distress.

original: dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to //
translated: All those assembled in the great maṇḍala exclaimed, Ha ha!

original: lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo //
translated: The great vidyādhara gods and others also caused a great rain of ornaments to fall.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal @80a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal @80a *//
translated: The Blessed One, with a smiling face, looked at Vajradhara and said:

original: pa / sdang ba sel ba dang / 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig /
analyzed: pa / sdang ba sel ba dang / 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not frighten this retinue too much by dispelling their hostility.

original: rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba //
translated: Vajradhara said:

original: bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das //
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gi gzungs 'di ni //
analyzed: bdag gi gzungs 'di ni //
translated: this dhāraṇī of mine

original: mchog tu gsang ba lags so //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba lags so //
translated: is supremely secret.

original: rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: It is the supreme of all mantras, it repels all obstacles, it repels all hostility, it dispels all hostility, it grants the sublime, it grants prosperity, it delights the hostile,

original: thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang // gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang /🔽nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyi pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang // gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyi pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: If heard, it has meaning; if spoken, it has meaning; if served, it has meaning; it generates power; it makes one beautiful; it generates eloquence; it causes the attainment of sovereignty;🔽it makes one wealthy; it causes control; it destroys hatred; it destroys light; it removes poison; it causes victory; it causes joy; it causes supreme joy;

original: dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par bgyid pa spyod pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par bgyid pa spyod pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: it causes clarity; it destroys pride; it causes defeat of the opponent; it pacifies evil; it causes the practice of error; it pacifies the afflictions such as desire;

original: mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid @80b pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid @80b pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: It averts the five acts of immediate retribution, pacifies bad dreams, pacifies inauspiciousness, increases glory, brings good fortune, delights all beings,

original: gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te /
analyzed: gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te /
translated: brings mastery over others, grants whatever is desired, perfects all good qualities, and completely pacifies excessive rain, drought, and untimely harm.

original: g-yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang /
analyzed: g-yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang /
translated: It is for great battles, great human illnesses, great disputes, and great fears such as non-humans, enmities, spells, great zombie practices, and expulsions.

original: srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la /
analyzed: srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la /
translated: When life is in danger, and when great fear arises, one should rise in the morning, wash one’s body,

original: gos dkar po 'tshal kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du blta zhing lan bdun brjod na //
analyzed: gos dkar po 'tshal kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du blta zhing lan bdun brjod na //
translated: and put on clean clothes. Facing east, one should recite this dhāraṇī seven times while looking at the face of Bhagavān Vajradhara.

original: brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: By merely reciting it, one will be liberated from all fears,

original: grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la /
analyzed: grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la /
translated: and one will also attain great accomplishment.

original: thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Everywhere one will be victorious.

original: sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped pa ni //
analyzed: sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped pa ni //
translated: For the protection, refuge, and preservation of sentient beings,

original: gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so //🔽de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas rdo rje 'chad la mtshan @81a *//
analyzed: gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so // de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas rdo rje 'chad la mtshan @81a *//
translated: there is no dhāraṇī greater than this.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa /🔽rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //🔽rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che // rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
translated: Then the entire assembly, having become astonished and amazed, praised Vajradhara with this praise in one hundred and eight names:🔽Vajrasattva, great being,🔽Vajrarāja, great bliss,

original: rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che //
translated: Vajrabhairava, great delight,

original: rdo rje snying po stobs po che //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po stobs po che //
translated: Vajra essence, great strength,

original: rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che //
translated: Vajra agitator, great noose,

original: snying rje chen po stobs po che //
analyzed: snying rje chen po stobs po che //
translated: Great compassion, great strength,

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad //
translated: Vajra terrifying, terrifying to fear,

original: rdo rje h'um gi h'um lags te //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um gi h'um lags te //
translated: Vajra hūṃ, hūṃ indeed,

original: rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po //
analyzed: rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po //
translated: Vajra underworld, terrifying,

original: chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che //
analyzed: chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che //
translated: Vajra passion, great passion,

original: chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che //
analyzed: chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che //
translated: Passion noose, great speed,

original: phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste //
analyzed: phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste //
translated: Red hands, long hands,

original: spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags //
analyzed: spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags //
translated: Red eyes, having eyes,

original: rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che //
analyzed: rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che //
translated: Vajra sapphire, great sapphire,

original: mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags //🔽ral gri sngon po ral gri che //
analyzed: mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags // ral gri sngon po ral gri che //
translated: Adorned with dark blue hair,🔽Blue sword, great sword,

original: dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can //
translated: Having a blue maṇḍala maṇḍala,

original: mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba //
analyzed: mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba //
translated: Sapphire eyes, blue head,

original: 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan //
analyzed: 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan //
translated: Having the light of a great sapphire,

original: rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs //🔽rdo rje spro ba'i stobs che ba //
analyzed: rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs // rdo rje spro ba'i stobs che ba //
translated: Vajra blue, unequalled strength,🔽Great strength of emanating vajras,

original: khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che //
analyzed: khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che //
translated: Vajra wrath, great wrath,

original: sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel //
analyzed: sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel //
translated: Dispeller of arrogance of wrathful dispeller,

original: khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod //
analyzed: khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod //
translated: His wrathful eyes are wide open.

original: khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad //
analyzed: khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad //
translated: The wrathful one dispels the types of obstructors.

original: gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste //
analyzed: gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste //
translated: He holds a bow and a noose.

original: rdo rje'i mdas ni nges par 'gums //
analyzed: rdo rje'i mdas ni nges par 'gums //
translated: He is pierced by a vajra arrow.

original: dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams //
analyzed: dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams //
translated: He holds a club and a vajra sword.

original: rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms //
analyzed: rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms //
translated: He is destroyed by a vajra noose.

original: rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che //
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che //
translated: He is a vajra wheel, a great wheel,🔽with a terrifying roar, very wrathful,

original: 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu @81b tu khro; ;sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu @81b tu khro; ;sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris //
translated: with a variegated body, marked with bindus.

original: gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa //
analyzed: gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa //
translated: He generates splendor, he is glorious,

original: bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod //
analyzed: bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod //
translated: difficult to bear, difficult to touch.

original: sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa //
analyzed: sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa //
translated: He severs evil and obstructors.

original: drag po chen po rdo rje khro //
analyzed: drag po chen po rdo rje khro //
translated: He is a great wrathful one, a vajra wrathful one.

original: sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad //
analyzed: sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad //
translated: He overturns, he overturns the wrathful one.

original: gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs //
analyzed: gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs //
translated: He is difficult to fathom, he has gone far.

original: rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'//
analyzed: rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'//
translated: He is a jewel ocean, he is delighted.

original: rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan //
analyzed: rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan //
translated: He is an ocean, he is endowed with the power of Meru.

original: dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse //
analyzed: dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse //
translated: He is the supreme Meru, the peak of Meru.

original: gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po //
analyzed: gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po //
translated: He is the one who laughs with a great laugh.

original: spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum //🔽rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can //
analyzed: spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum // rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can //
translated: His domain is the three incalculable eons.🔽He is the supreme vajra holder of knowledge mantras,

original: rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags //
translated: The lord of great knowledge mantras.

original: na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol //
analyzed: na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol //
translated: He wears red-stemmed hanging garments,

original: mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes //
analyzed: mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes //
translated: And is delighted by the high hanging garments of the utpala flower.

original: srin po srung po drag po ste //
analyzed: srin po srung po drag po ste //
translated: He is the protector of rakshasas, the fierce one,

original: me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes //
translated: Delighted by the ornament of flower garlands.

original: nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od //
analyzed: nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od //
translated: He is the great sun, the light of the sun,

original: 'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed //
analyzed: 'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed //
translated: Emitting hundreds of light rays.

original: grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po //
analyzed: grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po //
translated: He is the liberator, the protector, the teacher,

original: rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod //
analyzed: rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod //
translated: Worshiped by the supreme ones.

original: mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba //
analyzed: mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba //
translated: He has a large throat, a blue throat,

original: mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags //
analyzed: mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags //
translated: A beautiful throat, a beautiful face, a holy one.

original: cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od //
analyzed: cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od //
translated: He has a great crown, the light of the vajra,

original: phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa //
translated: Endowed with abundance, a pure mind,

original: ye shes che ldan srung ba che //
analyzed: ye shes che ldan srung ba che //
translated: Endowed with great wisdom, a great protector,

original: rlung dmar lags te spyod yul ring //
analyzed: rlung dmar lags te spyod yul ring //
translated: A great wind, with a distant domain.

original: gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs //
analyzed: gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs //
translated: He is the chief liberator, going to the other side,

original: 'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa //
analyzed: 'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa //
translated: The liberator from fear, the greatly fearful one.

original: rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs //
analyzed: rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs //
translated: He is the great jewel on the crown.

original: mtshon @82a *// cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon //
analyzed: mtshon @82a *// cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon //
translated: He is the wielder of various great weapons.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig /
translated: He is the one great way of the three worlds.

original: gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug phud gsum //
analyzed: gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug phud gsum //
translated: He is the three-eyed one, the three-crested one.

original: 'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan //
translated: He is the god of desire, the one with a great appearance.

original: za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad //
analyzed: za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad //
translated: He is the eater, the one who makes fearful.

original: mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa //
analyzed: mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa //
translated: He is the lofty one, the one with the supreme body and three faces.

original: tsham tshom med de srin las byung //
analyzed: tsham tshom med de srin las byung //
translated: He is the one without hesitation, the one born from the demon.

original: rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'byor ba //
analyzed: rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'byor ba //
translated: He is the one always delighted in the white, the one prosperous in the time.

original: rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad //
analyzed: rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad //
translated: He is the one who increases the royal class, the one who increases the lunar mansion.

original: rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste //
analyzed: rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste //
translated: He is the king, the great mantra holder.

original: bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags //
analyzed: bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags //
translated: He is the lord of all obstacles, the skilled one.

original: beed'urya ltar dri med sku //
analyzed: beed'urya ltar dri med sku //
translated: His body is stainless like a beryl.

original: mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs //
analyzed: mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs //
translated: He is the beautiful one, the one who increases strength, the one with various strengths.

original: dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad //
analyzed: dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad //
translated: He is the one who produces joy, the one who delights.

original: dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /
translated: He is the supreme holder of the three jewels.

original: lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste //
analyzed: lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste //
translated: He is the great god, the great hero.

original: brtan po dpa' bo lham me ba //
analyzed: brtan po dpa' bo lham me ba //
translated: He is the stable one, the heroic one, the radiant one.

original: bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod //
analyzed: bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod //
translated: He is the one with great bliss, the one who severs bondage.

original: dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba //
analyzed: dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba //
translated: Possessing the power of firm binding,

original: mtshon cha che rdzogs cod pan can //
analyzed: mtshon cha che rdzogs cod pan can //
translated: With a crown of great weapons complete,

original: rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba //
translated: Delighting the assembly of knowledge-mantra holders,

original: padma chen po phyag ring ba //
analyzed: padma chen po phyag ring ba //
translated: With long arms and a great lotus,

original: padma las byung padma'i mdog /
analyzed: padma las byung padma'i mdog /
translated: Arisen from a lotus, with the color of a lotus,

original: nag po chen po 'byung po che //
analyzed: nag po chen po 'byung po che //
translated: Great Mahākāla, great bhūta,🔽Great fierce one, great thunderbolt, great wind,

original: gtum chen thog thog chen po ste; ;rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa //
analyzed: gtum chen thog thog chen po ste; ;rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa //
translated: Laughing, arising, with a hundred vajra weapons complete,

original: rtul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste //
analyzed: rtul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste //
translated: Valiant, difficult to conquer, diligent,

original: 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje //
analyzed: 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje //
translated: Lord of the assembly of great bhūtas,🔽Peaceful, with a vajra weapon,

original: zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i @82b mtshon; ;brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems //
analyzed: zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i @82b mtshon; ;brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems //
translated: Scattering from the peak of the rock,

original: rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba //
translated: The great-formed son of the Victor,

original: rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan //
translated: Ornament of the vajra maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa //
translated: Burning with the vajra arrow,

original: rdo rje mdas ni rnam par sbyong //🔽rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang //
analyzed: rdo rje mdas ni rnam par sbyong // rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang //
translated: Purifying with the vajra arrow,🔽Vajra Amogha, vajra power,

original: rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal //
analyzed: rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal //
translated: Good Vajra, vajra strength,

original: ye shes dam pa theg pa che //
analyzed: ye shes dam pa theg pa che //
translated: Supreme wisdom, great vehicle,

original: thabs brnyes pa snying rje chen po lags //
analyzed: thabs brnyes pa snying rje chen po lags //
translated: The method is great compassion.

original: rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can //
translated: The great vajra is playful.

original: spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po //
analyzed: spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po //
translated: The one with beautiful eyes is the seer.

original: rdo rje dril bu rnam dag sbyan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu rnam dag sbyan //
translated: The giver of the pure vajra and bell,

original: mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen //
analyzed: mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen //
translated: The friend, the beloved, the knower of commitments,

original: rdo rje chen po mgon po ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po mgon po ba //
translated: The protector of the great vajra,

original: rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad /
analyzed: rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad /
translated: The one who terrifies the vajra underworld,

original: rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrog /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrog /
translated: The one who laughs with the great vajra,

original: me tog chun po 'od gsal ba //🔽dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras //
analyzed: me tog chun po 'od gsal ba // dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras //
translated: The one with a garland of flowers and bright light,🔽The son of the pure Shuddhodana,

original: des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags //
analyzed: des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags //
translated: The gentle one, the fortunate one, the pure one,

original: sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog /🔽rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan //🔽rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can //
analyzed: sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog / rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan // rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can //
translated: The one with variety, the supreme god of all,🔽Endowed with the vajra army's maṇḍala,🔽The one with the beautiful vajra crest, the wise one,

original: rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes //
translated: The one with the beautiful vajra array,

original: mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag /
analyzed: mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag /
translated: The beautiful one, the extremely pure one,

original: bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags //
analyzed: bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags //
translated: The one like the great eon wind,

original: dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang //
analyzed: dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang //
translated: The hero, the holder of the great secret,

original: rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed //
translated: The one praised by the supreme vidyādhara,

original: gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung //
analyzed: gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung //
translated: The one with secrets, the one who speaks secrets,

original: skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba //
translated: The assembly of men and women are delighted.

original: rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrog /
analyzed: rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrog /
translated: The great sound of the vajra's thunder.

original: rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms //🔽rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms // rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che //
translated: That vajra sound is completely victorious.🔽The vajra hook is greatly joyful.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba //
translated: The blazing vajra is greatly blazing.

original: nor bu spras pa'i na @83a *//🔽bza' gsol // spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan //
analyzed: nor bu spras pa'i na @83a *// bza' gsol // spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan //
translated: Wearing a jeweled crown,🔽adorned with incense and flower garlands,

original: dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags //
analyzed: dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags //
translated: with earrings and anklets on the head.

original: sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po //
translated: The teacher of the Buddha's teachings,

original: rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
analyzed: rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
translated: the king equal to all the buddhas,

original: dbang phyug chen po grags pa che //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po grags pa che //
translated: the greatly renowned Maheśvara,

original: dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can //
translated: the maṇḍala master possessing a maṇḍala,

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po //
translated: the teacher of the buddha maṇḍala,

original: dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings //
analyzed: dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings //
translated: with a crown and diadem completely bound,

original: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags //
translated: adorned with various ornaments.

original: de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon //
translated: Thus the vajra lord,

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod //
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod //
translated: praised with one hundred and eight names.

original: de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa /
translated: Then Vajrayakṣa spoke:

original: rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi //
translated: Adorned with the secret vajra,

original: rdo rje mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Amoghasiddhi.🔽This is the name of Vajra Acalanatha.🔽This is the name of Vajra Sattvavajrini.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayatara.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

original: ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung //🔽sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa //
analyzed: ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung // sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

analyzed: ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di // dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

analyzed: grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

analyzed: lag na rdo rje stobs po che; ;rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur // lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

original: gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod //
analyzed: gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

analyzed: de ni sdig pa kun las grol // ngan 'gro kun las thar par 'gyur //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

analyzed: gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di // su zhig nangs par langs nas brjod //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.

analyzed: rgyal po blon po grong khyer pa // gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' @83b par 'gyur // bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa //

original: 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur //
translated: This is the name of Vajra Samayavajra.🔽This is the name

original: sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur //🔽ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur // ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin //
translated: And their lifespan and merit will increase.🔽They will attain

original: bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur //
translated: The supreme bliss they desire.

original: gang zhig nang par langs nas ni //
analyzed: gang zhig nang par langs nas ni //
translated: Whoever rises in the morning

original: lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod //
translated: And recites in front of Vajrapāṇi,🔽They will attain

original: de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med; ;ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med; ;ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la //
translated: Whatever they desire, without doubt.🔽All obstacles, misleaders,

original: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang //
analyzed: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang //
translated: And terrifying kings

original: zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
analyzed: zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
translated: Will be unable to overpower them.

original: shes rab can ni gang zhig gis //
analyzed: shes rab can ni gang zhig gis //
translated: Whoever, with wisdom,

original: ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na //
analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na //
translated: Recites the supreme one hundred and eight names,🔽Will attain the increase of good form, strength,

original: gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob //🔽gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di //
analyzed: gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob // gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di //
translated: And the growth of bliss.🔽Whoever,

original: nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don //🔽mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi //
analyzed: nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don // mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi //
translated: Purely recites these one hundred and eight names,🔽In brief, they will attain

original: bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur //
translated: The increase of good qualities and bliss.

original: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī mantra together with the one hundred and eight names of the noble Vajrapāṇi is complete.
